on reading compounds: 蔵【ゾウ】possession, ownership, (former) Ministry of Finance, Tibet, Tibetan people
蔵書【ゾウショ】collection of books, (personal) library
地蔵【ジゾウ】Kshitigarbha (bodhisattva who looks over children, travellers and the underworld) (travelers), Ksitigarbha, Jizo
内蔵【ナイゾウ】internal (e.g. disk), built-in, equipped (with)
kun reading compounds: 蔵【くら】warehouse, storehouse, cellar, magazine, granary, godown, depository, treasury, elevator
蔵元【くらもと】brewery (sake, soy), brewer, warehouse overseer
大蔵【おおくら】Ministry of Finance
お蔵【おくら】shelving (a play, movie, etc.), closing down, cancelling, canceling, shelf (i.e. "on the shelf"), rice storehouse of the Edo shogunate
